p: In vitro and in vivo samples (200 mg) were homogenised with liquid nitrogen. Then 2 mL of phosphate buffer (pH = 7.8) was added and centrifuged at 13000 g for 15 min at 4 °C. The supernatant was used for assessment of catalase (CAT), guaiacol peroxidase (POD) and ascorbate peroxidase (APX) activities. CAT (EC 1.11.1.6) activity was determined by measuring the consumption of H 2O 2 according to the method of Aebi ( 1984). POD (EC 1.11.1.7) activity was measured in accordance with the method of Maehly and Chance ( 1954). APX (EC 1.11.1.11) activity was assayed according to the method of Nakano and Asada ( 1981).
